title: Garden Gnome Gangbang
description: When Jenny adds a little whimsical flavor to her garden with a trio of gnome statues, she never suspects what's in store. When the sun goes down, Jenny discovers her new lawn ornaments are ready to get busy, and they know how to use those pointy red hats to please a woman!Warning: Explicit adult material. Three on one action, hard pointy hats, and gnomehoods as big as any man's! 3300 words
author: Fannie Tucker
